sourceMeaningMnemonic: You got your copy of "The <radical>Dry</radical> <radical>Knife</radical>." It's the newest <kanji>edition</kanji> of the magazine you love on keeping your knives dry.
meaningInfo: You're really into this magazine, and when you heard there's a new edition of it, you went out and bought it right away.
readingMnemonic: In this <kanji>edition</kanji> of "The Dry Knife," there is a huge article written by Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (<ja>かん</ja>) on how he kept his knives dry while campaigning.
readingInfo: The article on Genghis Khan was perhaps the best written article in the Dry Knife series to date. How did this magazine get such a big interview?
